attributes.action: withdraw all British troops from Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has become clear that the Iraqis don't want us there. Although it was a good decision to asist in the removal of Saddam, now our troops should be removed to concentrate on finding Bin Laden. Iraq is simply not worth the life of one more British soldier

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
